## Getting and Cleaing Data Course Project:

This repo contains the R code and documentation files of Courser's "Getting and Cleaning Data" Course project.

## Files:

The code in the run_analysis.R files assummes that all of the data is downloaded and uncompressed in the working directory with original file names. 

run_analysis.R contains the code to perform cleaning data 5 steps.

CodeBook.Rmd contains information about all the variables or transformation used in the R script (run_analysis.R) for tidying data.

tidy_data.txt contains the tidy data obtained after running the R script (run_analysis.R).
